attributes.action: The price of petrol it affecting our lives in every way possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The price of petrol in the UK at the moment is just rising all the time and this is affecting our everyday lives in more ways than any one person can imagine. The current petrol price rises are affecting businesses, services, and the lively hood of every person in the UK even if they don't drive! With this petition i am calling for the MP's running this country to lower the tax we pay on petrol. And think of other ways to make this money back if it is needed

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=reduce+petrol+price&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=lower+petrol&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
